content:
Alex Fl端ckiger studied Sociology and Computational Linguistics reconciling his major interests in the absence of a distinguished studies in Computational Social Science at the time. Driven by a sociological curiosity and amazing technological opportunities, I like to investigate the past, the current and the potential future of society at small and large.
Currently I work as a guest lecturer at the University of Lucerne introducing computational methods to students of social students.
Get in touch. I am happy to answer questions, learning about your projects or just have a talk about coffee, beer and other important ingredients of life.
